When Geeks get Parents

October 10th , 2011

It's so funny what happens when Geeks get parents.

This is what happens if your dad is a designer:

The Original (or at least the highest resolution I found) is here as PDF.

Giving your child some funny T-shirts is also quite common: [caption id="attachment_5251" align="aligncenter" width="400" caption="Baby Geek: No! (found on zazzle)"][/caption]

[caption id="attachment_5261" align="aligncenter" width="325" caption="It seems like someone liked RPGs here :-)"][/caption]

A friend of mine just shared this photo: [caption id="attachment_5141" align="aligncenter" width="320" caption="Twins: Copy and Paste. Thanks to René for sharing and Alida Brandenburg for posting it in Google+. Althoug this seems to be the original."][/caption]

Do you have more images or perhaps stories of geeky parents? Please let me know in a comment!
